ModMetaData.name: Sized Apparel Multi Alien Patch
ModMetaData.author: AlexDuKaNa, Ryufais
ModMetaData.description:
Adds SAR support for some HAR races, including support for child bodies. A retexture of NyaamZ's SAR alien races mod.
Ryufais: All new alien textures and offset adjustments are done by AlexDuKaNa, i simply added patches for the relevant races so their parts would apply.
- Thanks to NyaamZ for the alien races textures. - Thanks to Talos for the Miho desertskin textures
